document.full_text: a top u.s. lawmaker said on monday that pakistani security services have questions they need to answer following the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden in an affluent area of pakistan.
document.title: u.s. lawmaker has "questions" for pakistani security
lines_and_colors: a top u.s. lawmaker said on monday that pakistani security services have questions they need to answer following the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden in an affluent area of pakistan.
